name: bingley hat
sizes_available: child sizes: premature (0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, 3-10 years), adult sizes: teen/small adult (medium adult, large adult)
notes:
cozy, warm and super simple to make, this side to side ribbed dk crochet hat pattern is a winner for the whole family! in sizes newborn baby to large adult you can adapt the pattern to fit your style too. 

made in simple side across rows with some simple short row shaping, it’s a great unisex crochet pattern that can have a slouchy or fitted look depending on the length you chose to make.

you can even adapt the pattern to suit any yarn and hook size you would like!

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.

**what's included:**	
a 7-page pdf including written pattern in us terms, gauge tutorial, construction diagram, customisation information.
full pattern video tutorial.
pattern support of you need or would like it.

difficulty is easy.

**materials and tools:**
hook: 4.5mm (g+) [crochet hook][1] or size needed to obtain gauge
suggested yarn: [mary maxim mellowspun dk][2] (100% acrylic, 284yds, 260m/100g)
1 ball per hat required.

**sizing:**
child sizes: premature (0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, 3-10 years)
adult sizes: teen/small adult (medium adult, large adult)

gauge: 18 sts and 16 rows measure 10 x 10cm (4x4in) in main set pattern using a 4.5mm hook, or size needed to obtain correct tension.

please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out!

you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use to make and sell your finished items on a small scale. credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated!

i'd love for you to find and follow me for more tutorials, patterns and inspiration:

blog - https://www.hanjancrochet.com 
[subscribe to hanjancrochet][3]
